title: UNP TO INTERVIEW LG CANDIDATES, LOYALTY TO TAKE PRECEDENCE
content: A large number of applications from prospective candidates for the upcoming Local Government elections have been received by now, says the United National Party (UNP). District level interviews are to be held on October 16 and 17. UNP chairman Gamini Jayawickrema Perera said that this time round, the main emphasis in picking candidates will be…
